Introduction
This topic contains information on taking action on A&A status following the discharge of a claimant from a qualified nursing home, including
award and notification action to take when no medical evidence is submitted for reconsideration of A&A
determining the effective date to discontinue A&A status under 38 CFR 3.351
referring cases for reconsideration by the rating activity
notifying the beneficiary when A&A is established by rating decision
notifying the beneficiary when A&A is not established
, and
action to take when the award cannot be made in time to comply with the effective date in the rating decision
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Aid and Attendance (A&A) Status for Beneficiaries Who Are Patients in a Qualified Nursing Home
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
